data.title: Finding BCBS 239 As Biggest Trend Driver
data.meta_description: GoldenSource CEO John Eley looks forward to 2015 as part of our year-end series Linked databases and entity masters on the rise in response to the risk data aggregation principles, says the chief of data management software provider GoldenSource
data.text:
In a series of Q&As to appear over the last few weeks of 2014, Inside Reference Data is asking financial services data management industry experts what the trends are likely to be in 2015 for data management, how legal entity identifier (LEI) implementation will proceed, and how data may be gaining importance and attention at the highest leadership level in firms. Today, we hear from John Eley, CEO of GoldenSource.

What new technologies will impact reference data this year?

Technology is always
